name: Smelter
subtitle: Imports items from inventories into the pedestal.

pages.name: Import Setup
pages.text: Insert Upgrade into a pedestal (Placed in any direction on some inventory).

pages.title: Enchants
pages.text: $(li)$(l)Speed$(): Increases the Rate at which items are extracted. $(l)MAX Level: 5 $() $(li)$(l)Capacity$(): Increases the amount of items extracted per operation. $(l)MAX Level: 5 $() $(li)$(l)Advanced$(): (See Advanced Uses Page for More Info) $(l)MAX Level: 1$()

pages.title: Redstone Comparator Output
pages.text: Outputs redstone equal to how much fuel is left. This is based on fuel level though, so from 0-10 fuel, 11-100, 101-1000, 1001-10000...etc it will output based on the level of fuel left for its fuel range.

pages.title: Normal Uses
pages.text: $(li)By default this upgrade will extract items from the 'below' inventory. $(br)$(li)There is a secondary use, which is if any items collide with a pedestal with this upgrade, those items will be inserted into the pedestal, this allows for easier collecting of items from water traps without the need of a magnet.

pages.title: Normal Uses Con.
pages.text: $(li)Default Inventories that this can extract from: Block Inventories and Minecrafts with Inventories.

pages.title: Advanced Uses
pages.text: Allows use of ANY entities inventory, this Entity must still be within the 1 block space below the pedestal, but any entity can be used, $(li)Lama: Auto import items to storage? $(li)Grab that enchanted bow off that annoying skelly? $(li)Troll your friends as they walk into your trapped hallway? $(br)Possibilities are endless!
